title: Land with House for Sale in Colombo 05
details:
Highlights
- Land extent: 17.44 Perches
- Property is located on a residential lane off Elvitigala Mawatha.
- Approx. 200 meters from Narahenpita Junction.
- Walking distance to Asiri Surgical Hospital & Asiri Medical Hospital.
- 30 year old, two story house currently resides on the property. Selling for land value.
- The property is accessible via a 20 foot wide access road.

House Details
- Three bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2548 square foot house with large garden.
- Spacious upstairs and down stairs living area, separate pantry and wet kitchen.
- Double garage with electric roller gate.
- Well maintained house with large garden.

Clear title.
